thread.title: Joe Leightner joins Datawatch Systems as Vice President of Sales and Marketing

author: cnbc.com
title: Joe Leightner joins Datawatch Systems as Vice President of Sales and Marketing
text:
BETHESDA, Md., Feb. 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Joe Leightner has joined Datawatch Systems as Vice President of Sales and Marketing. He brings Datawatch over 25 years of professional experience in strategic sales and marketing throughout the Mid-Atlantic Region.
Joe holds a Bachelor of Science Degree in Business Administration specializing in Marketing, from The Ohio State University. Prior to joining Datawatch, he held several senior-level positions with national parking management companies. He brings Datawatch an extensive array of operational, technical, sales and executive experience. This, coupled with his dedication and success in building new business, will be paramount to Datawatch's continued growth. We are proud to have him as part of the team.
Joe can be contacted at: jleightner@datawatchsystems.com or 301-280-4361.
About Datawatch:
Datawatch is an industry leader in access control, providing advanced systems with user-friendly interfaces, backed by our highly trained and professional staff 24/7/365. We develop customized services to keep our client's businesses and employees safe and secure. For additional information, visit http://www.datawatchsystems.com .
For more information contact:
Paula Crosby, Marketing Director
240-691-9985
pcrosby@datawatchsystems.com
